title: PBE accounts
body:
I've played since the start of Season 2 and I have never gotten PBE access.

 I've signed up multiple times throughout the seasons and haven't gotten anything,

replies.body: Looking into this for you, I do see that your application was received.  Unfortunately, we have no way to force through an application.  I don't have any details on how to expedite or get into pbe beyond what's in our[ PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  Best of luck with your application!
